subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rickwood Field, in Birmingham, Ala., is touted as America’s oldest baseball park. It was built on Aug. 18, 1910, and will celebrate its 100th anniversary this year.
snippet: Rickwood Field, in Birmingham, Ala., is touted as America’s oldest baseball park. It was built on Aug. 18, 1910, and will celebrate its 100th anniversary this year.
